description: Detects tampering with the "Enabled" registry key in order to disable Windows logging of a Windows event channel
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Rare falsepositives may occur from legitimate administrators disabling specific event log for troubleshooting
name: Disable Windows Event Logging Via Registry
query: (((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/[Hh][Kk][Ll][Mm]\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ee][Vv][Tt]\\[Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ee][Ll][Ss]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Dd]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:/[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\ \(0[Xx]00000000\)/) AND (NOT ((process.executable:/.*\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ww][Ee][Vv][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ss][Xx][Ss]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\[Tt][Ii][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ee][Vv][Tt]\\[Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ee][Ll][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Mm][Ii][Nn][Ii][Ff][Ii][Ll][Tt][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ee][Vv][Tt]\\[Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ee][Ll][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Aa][Ss][Nn]1\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ee][Vv][Tt]\\[Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ee][Ll][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Kk][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Ll]\-[Aa][Pp][Pp][Cc][Oo][Mm][Pp][Aa][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ee][Vv][Tt]\\[Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ee][Ll][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Rr][Uu][Nn][Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee]\\[Ee][Rr][Rr][Oo][Rr]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ee][Vv][Tt]\\[Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ee][Ll][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Cc][Aa][Pp][Ii]2\/[Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Aa][Ll]\\.*/))) OR ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ss][Tt][Ee][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Ll][Ll][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ee][Vv][Tt]\\[Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ee][Ll][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Cc][Oo][Mm][Pp][Aa][Tt]\-[Aa][Pp][Pp][Rr][Aa][Ii][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/))))) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:) OR (NOT _exists_:process.executable.text))))
